A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: So what is left is White Woman (Rey)\, to be mentored by an older White Woman (Leia/Kathleen Kennedy)\, and assisted by a Hispanic Male (Po)\, a Black Male (Finn)\, and an Asian Woman (Rose).  Their remaining goal is to 'Resist'\, humiliate\, and kill the evil White Men (G. Hux and Kylo)\, and turn the world into the beautiful future we all deserve.  Star Wars is now just the perfect Leftist fantasy film.  No wonder critics love it\, but people (even with decades of love for the franchise) don't.
